titles.title: Only A Step To Jesus (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only a step Only a step Come He waits for thee Come and thy sin confessing Thou shalt receive a blessing Do not reject the mercy He freely offers thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only a step to Jesus Then why not take it now Come and thy sin confessing To Him thy Savior bow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only a step to Jesus Believe and thou shalt live Lovingly now He's waiting And ready to forgive{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only a step to Jesus A step from sin to grace What hast thy heart decided The moments fly apace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only a step to Jesus Oh why not come and say Gladly to Thee my Savior I give myself away{/lang-eng}
